instruction: Add three new attributes to an online product description.
input: The iPhone 12 Pro Max is Apple's latest flagship smartphone, featuring a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display, 5G connectivity, A14 Bionic chip, LiDAR scanner, and up to 512GB of storage.
output: The iPhone 12 Pro Max is Apple's latest flagship smartphone, featuring a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display, 5G connectivity, A14 Bionic chip, LiDAR scanner, eSIM support, IP68 waterproof rating, up to 8K video recording, up to 512GB of storage, and an extended battery life.
